channel.title: How to fix slayer?
channel.description: In my source 317 are many npc in slayer tower, but to fight with them i need big slayer lvl(abby demon 85 slayer), how to do that slayer lvl can be trained on my source or how to do that ppl in my source can att npc withouth slayer lvl? Thx for help :)

item.title: How to fix slayer?
item.dc:creator: @pk_george1 pk george1
item.description:
@pk_george1 wrote:

If you want to make it say that you can train a certain level then you must make it so that once you have killed an npc it adds xp to your slayer.

Or iff you want to make it so everybody can attack the slayer monsters with 1 slayer remove the level requirement on the slayer monsters.

Check the client.java and i think clicking.most java or npc.handler.

Read full topic
